verses.verse: וַיֹּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3254> And again אַף־ <WH639> the anger יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לַחֲר֖וֹת <WH2734> was kindled בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיָּ֨סֶת <WH5496> and he moved אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> David בָּהֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> against them to say לֵ֛ךְ <WH1980> Go מְנֵ֥ה <WH4487> number אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> and Judah

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> For the king אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹאָ֣ב ׀ <WH3097> to Joab שַׂר־ <WH8269> the captain הַחַ֣יִל <WH2428> of the host אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֗וֹ <WH854> for שֽׁוּט־ <WH7751> which [was] with him Go now through נָ֞א <WH4994> now בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֤י <WH7626> all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מִדָּן֙ <WH1835> from Dan וְעַד־ <WH5704> against בְּאֵ֣ר שֶׁ֔בַע <WH884> even to Beersheba וּפִקְד֖וּ <WH6485> and number אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ye the people וְיָ֣דַעְתִּ֔י <WH3045> that I may know אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִסְפַּ֥ר <WH4557> the number הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹאָ֜ב <WH3097> And Joab אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king וְיוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> add יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> Now the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֨יךָ <WH430> thy God אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> unto the people כָּהֵ֤ם ׀ <WH1992> how many soever וְכָהֵם֙ <WH1992> like מֵאָ֣ה <WH3967> A hundred פְעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> times וְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> and that the eyes אֲדֹנִֽי־ <WH113> of my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king רֹא֑וֹת <WH7200> may see וַאדֹנִ֣י <WH113> [it] but why doth my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לָ֥מָּה <WH4100> why חָפֵ֖ץ <WH2654> delight בַּדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> act הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֶּחֱזַ֤ק <WH2388> prevailed דְּבַר־ <WH1697> word הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> Notwithstanding the king's אֶל־ <WH413> against יוֹאָ֔ב <WH3097> against Joab וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and against שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and against the captains הֶחָ֑יִל <WH2428> of the host וַיֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> went out יוֹאָ֜ב <WH3097> And Joab וְשָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> and the captains הַחַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> of the host לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> from the presence הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king לִפְקֹ֥ד <WH6485> to number אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> the people אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיַּעַבְר֖וּ <WH5674> And they passed over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> and pitched בַעֲרוֹעֵ֗ר <WH6177> in Aroer יְמִ֥ין <WH3225> on the right side הָעִ֛יר <WH5892> of the city אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> is in בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> that [lieth] in the midst הַנַּ֥חַל <WH5158> of the river הַגָּ֖ד <WH1410> of Gad וְאֶל־ <WH413> and toward יַעְזֵֽר׃ <WH3270> and toward Jazer

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> Then they came הַגִּלְעָ֔דָה <WH1568> to Gilead וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and to the land תַּחְתִּ֖ים חָדְשִׁ֑י <WH8483> of Tahtimhodshi וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> and they came דָּ֣נָה יַּ֔עַן <WH1842> to Danjaan וְסָבִ֖יב <WH5439> and about אֶל־ <WH413> to צִידֽוֹן׃ <WH6721> to Zidon

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> And came מִבְצַר־ <WH4013> to the strong hold צֹ֔ר <WH6865> of Tyre וְכָל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> and to all the cities הַחִוִּ֖י <WH2340> of the Hivites וְהַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <WH3669> and of the Canaanites וַיֵּֽצְא֛וּ <WH3318> and they went out אֶל־ <WH413> to נֶ֥גֶב <WH5045> to the south יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah בְּאֵ֥ר שָֽׁבַע׃ <WH884> [even] to Beersheba

וַיָּשֻׁ֖טוּ <WH7751> So when they had gone בְּכָל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> through all the land וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> they came מִקְצֵ֨ה <WH7097> at the end תִשְׁעָ֧ה <WH8672> of nine חֳדָשִׁ֛ים <WH2320> months וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty י֖וֹם <WH3117> days יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> gave up יוֹאָ֛ב <WH3097> And Joab אֶת־ <WH853> מִסְפַּ֥ר <WH4557> the sum מִפְקַד־ <WH4662> of the number הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> of the people אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king וַתְּהִ֣י <WH1961> were in יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> and there were in Israel שְׁמֹנֶה֩ <WH8083> eight מֵא֨וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> thousand אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> and the men חַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> valiant שֹׁ֣לֵֽף <WH8025> that drew חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> the sword וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah חֲמֵשׁ־ <WH2568> [were] five מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> smote לֵב־ <WH3820> heart דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David's אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> him after כֵ֖ן <WH3651> after that סָפַ֣ר <WH5608> that he had numbered אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people ס וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> unto the LORD חָטָ֤אתִי <WH2398> I have sinned מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> greatly אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> in that I have done וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> now יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and now I beseech thee O LORD הַֽעֲבֶר־ <WH5674> take away נָא֙ <WH4994> please אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> of thy servant כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִסְכַּ֖לְתִּי <WH5528> foolishly מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> for I have done very

וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> was up דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> For when David בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> in the morning פ וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD הָיָה֙ <WH1961> came אֶל־ <WH413> about גָּ֣ד <WH1410> Gad הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> came unto the prophet חֹזֵ֥ה <WH2374> seer דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> David's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הָל֞וֹךְ <WH1980> Go וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <WH1696> Thus saith אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> unto David כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> and say יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שָׁלֹ֕שׁ <WH7969> thee three אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I נוֹטֵ֣ל <WH5190> I offer עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> and בְּחַר־ <WH977> [things] choose לְךָ֥ אַֽחַת־ <WH259> thee one מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> of them that I may [do it] unto thee לָּֽךְ׃

וַיָּבֹא־ <WH935> came גָ֥ד <WH1410> So Gad אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> to David וַיַּגֶּד־ <WH5046> and told ל֑וֹ וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> him and said ל֡וֹ הֲתָב֣וֹא <WH935> come לְךָ֣ שֶֽׁבַע <WH7651> unto him Shall seven שָׁנִ֣ים ׀ <WH8141> years רָעָ֣ב ׀ <WH7458> of famine בְּאַרְצֶ֡ךָ <WH776> common אִם־ <WH518> lo שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three חֳ֠דָשִׁים <WH2320> months נֻסְךָ֨ <WH5127> flee לִפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> before צָרֶ֜יךָ <WH6862> thine enemies וְה֣וּא <WH1931> they רֹדְפֶ֗ךָ <WH7291> while they pursue וְאִם־ <WH518> lo הֱ֠יוֹת <WH1961> become שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <WH7969> thee? or that there be three יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days' דֶּ֙בֶר֙ <WH1698> pestilence בְּאַרְצֶ֔ךָ <WH776> common עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> henceforth דַּ֣ע <WH3045> consider וּרְאֵ֔ה <WH7200> and see מָה־ <WH4100> what אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> I shall return שֹׁלְחִ֖י <WH7971> to him that sent דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> what answer ס

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to גָּ֖ד <WH1410> unto Gad צַר־ <WH6862> adversary לִ֣י מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> I am in a great נִפְּלָה־ <WH5307> let us fall נָּ֤א <WH4994> now בְיַד־ <WH3027> now into the hand יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> [are] great [רַחֲמֹו כ] (רַֽחֲמָ֔יו <WH7356> tender love ק) וּבְיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand אָדָ֖ם <WH120> of man אַל־ <WH408> not אֶפֹּֽלָה׃ <WH5307> and let me not fall

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> sent יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> So the LORD דֶּ֙בֶר֙ <WH1698> a pestilence בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> upon Israel מֵהַבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> from the morning וְעַד־ <WH5704> until עֵ֣ת <WH6256> even to the time מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> appointed וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> and there died מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> of the people מִדָּן֙ <WH1835> from Dan וְעַד־ <WH5704> until בְּאֵ֣ר שֶׁ֔בַע <WH884> even to Beersheba שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> seventy אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <WH7971> stretched out יָד֨וֹ <WH3027> his hand הַמַּלְאָ֥ךְ ׀ <WH4397> And when the angel יְרֽוּשָׁלִַם֮ <WH3389> upon Jerusalem לְשַׁחֲתָהּ֒ <WH7843> to destroy וַיִּנָּ֤חֶם <WH5162> repented יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> it the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> of הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> him of the evil וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> and said לַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <WH4397> to the angel הַמַּשְׁחִ֤ית <WH7843> that destroyed בָּעָם֙ <WH5971> the people רַ֔ב <WH7227> It is enough עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> Now הֶ֣רֶף <WH7503> stay יָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> now thine hand וּמַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD הָיָ֔ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> was by גֹּ֖רֶן <WH1637> was by the threshingplace [הָאֹורְנָה כ] (הָאֲרַ֥וְנָה <WH728> Araunah ק) הַיְבֻסִֽי׃ <WH2983> the Jebusite ס

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> spake דָּוִ֨ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בִּרְאֹת֣וֹ ׀ <WH7200> when he saw אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַמַּלְאָ֣ךְ ׀ <WH4397> the angel הַמַּכֶּ֣ה <WH5221> that smote בָעָ֗ם <WH5971> the people וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> is I חָטָ֙אתִי֙ <WH2398> Lo I have sinned וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> is I הֶעֱוֵ֔יתִי <WH5753> and I have done wickedly וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> these הַצֹּ֖אן <WH6629> but these sheep מֶ֣ה <WH4100> what עָשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> what have they done תְּהִ֨י <WH1961> become נָ֥א <WH4994> let יָדְךָ֛ <WH3027> ? let thine hand בִּ֖י וּבְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> I pray thee be against me and against my father's פ

וַיָּבֹא־ <WH935> came גָ֥ד <WH1410> And Gad אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> to David בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ עֲלֵה֙ <WH5927> unto him Go up הָקֵ֤ם <WH6965> rear לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> an altar בְּגֹ֖רֶן <WH1637> in the threshingfloor [אָרָנְיָה כ] (אֲרַ֥וְנָה <WH728> Araunah ק) הַיְבֻסִֽי׃ <WH2983> the Jebusite

וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> went up דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David כִּדְבַר־ <WH1697> according to the saying גָּ֔ד <WH1410> of Gad כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> as the LORD

וַיַּשְׁקֵ֣ף <WH8259> looked אֲרַ֗וְנָה <WH728> And Araunah וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> and his servants עֹבְרִ֖ים <WH5674> coming on עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> toward וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out אֲרַ֔וְנָה <WH728> toward him and Araunah וַיִּשְׁתַּ֧חוּ <WH7812> and bowed לַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> himself before the king אַפָּ֖יו <WH639> on his face אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> upon the ground
